snippet: Emily Dickinson is the subject of this Poetry Pairing, which features her poem “Forever – is composed of Nows –” and the article “Enigmatic Dickinson Revealed Online” by Jennifer Schuessler.
abstract: Emily Dickinson is the subject of this Poetry Pairing, which features her poem “Forever – is composed of Nows –” and the article “Enigmatic Dickinson Revealed Online” by Jennifer Schuessler.
lead_paragraph: This Poetry Pairing pays tribute to Emily Dickinson (1830-86) and the scholars and archivists whose efforts ensure the poems, letters and other materials she left behind are preserved and accessible. We pair her poem “Forever – Is Composed of Nows –” with the article “Enigmatic Dickinson Revealed Online” by Jennifer Schuessler.

headline.main: Poetry Pairing | ‘Forever – Is Composed of Nows –’
